rooms.description: Two-car garage located at the corner of the plot to maximize space and ease of access. It adheres to local building norms and provides secure parking.
Open-plan living area that seamlessly connects with the kitchen, fostering a spacious atmosphere for social gatherings. Designed with Vastu principles in mind for positive energy flow.

Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and ample storage. Layout adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring proper alignment of cooking space.
Adjacent dining area with sufficient natural light and ventilation, designed for intimate family meals. Vastu principles ensure proper placement relative to other spaces.
Luxury master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, positioned in the North-West direction as per Vastu for prosperity and relaxation. Features large windows for natural light.
Spacious secondary bedroom designed with ample storage and en-suite bathroom, following Vastu guidelines to ensure comfort and tranquility.

openings.description: Main entrance facing the auspicious North-East direction, ensuring a positive entry of energy as per Vastu principles.
Garage access door aligned with the overall design for ease of vehicle movement and safety.
Large windows in the living area to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines regarding window placement for optimal airflow.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample storage space and en-suite facilities, designed to complement the overall aesthetic.
Final luxury bedroom offering a peaceful retreat with natural light and modern amenities. Placed as per Vastu guidelines to enhance relaxation.
Dedicated private gym area for personal fitness, designed with high ceilings and ample natural light. Layout follows Vastu principles to ensure balanced energy.
Shared bathroom in the first floor area, designed with modern fixtures and sufficient ventilation, aligned with Vastu guidelines for a harmonious living environment.

openings.description: Balcony providing a view and fresh air, integrated into the design of each bedroom. Complies with Vastu by being positioned appropriately.
